entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023
